text: Usage usage: wfgroupdisable <pattern matching expression for workflow group names> ... [ -mode < a >] This command disables one or more workflow groups. Options The command accepts the following options: Option Description Option Description [ -mode < a > ] Disable only workflow groups marked with a specified mode: a - Only Autostart groups are disabled. Return Codes Listed below are the different return codes for the wfgroupdisable command: Code Description 0 Will be returned if the command was successful. 1 Will be returned if the argument count is incorrect. 2 Will be returned if the user is not found or not logged in. 3 Will be returned if no matching workflow group was found.
title: mzcli - wfgroupdisable - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
